titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the Internal Revenue Service's private debt collection program.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the Internal Revenue Service's private debt collection program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal: (1) the authority for the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) to contract with private debt collection agencies to collect delinquent federal tax debt, and (2) the IRS Special Compliance Personnel Program Account which is funded by a portion of the funds collected under the private debt collection program.
